title: [Health] Gum disease increases risk of other illness such as mental health and heart conditions. The increased risk of developing mental ill-health was 37%, while the risk of developing autoimmune disease was increased by 33%, and the risk of developing cardiovascular disease was raised by 18%

[Health] Cannabis is the third most used recreational drug worldwide. A new cross-sectional study found that the highest scores for quality of life were observed among habitual cannabis users, followed by occasional users, while both non-users and dysfunctional users presented less favorable scores.
